QuestData.Title: Eredath, Jewel of Argus
QuestData.Description: The shattered ruin below us is all that remains of Eredath.$b$bWe called it the Jewel of Argus. It was here that my fellows in the triumvirate guided our people to prosperity. That was a long time ago.$b$b<Velen lapses into a moment of silence.>$b$bJoin me on the surface. We will begin our search for the Crown of the Triumvirate.
QuestData.RewardText: It is as if the battle never ceased. How long have they suffered like this?
